DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of single ascending (SAD) subcutaneous and single oral dose of GLPG0187 compared to placebo. Also, pharmacokinetics (PK) and pharmacodynamics (PD) of GLPG0187 after single subcutaneous and oral administration will be evaluated, and, if applicable, the maximum tolerated dose determined.
DOC.brief_title: First-in-Human Single Ascending Subcutaneous (s.c.) Dose and Single Oral Dose of GLPG0187
